title: 89/574/ECSC: Commission Decision of 24 October 1989 establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain (only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 October 1989
establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(89/574/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Deliveries of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain, may not exceed 110 000 tonnes during the year 1989.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 October 1989.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Vice-President
